name: drop
description: Drop is a minimalist, self-hosted file sharing service that allows drag-and-drop uploads and generates shareable links. It focuses on simplicity and speed, making it a handy replacement for generic file-drop services.
features: Drag-and-drop upload: Share files by dragging them into the browser window for instant upload without forms.
Shareable links: Generate unique URLs for each uploaded file that can be shared with others for download.
Expiration options: Set automatic deletion times for files to ensure temporary shares don't persist indefinitely.
No registration: Upload and share files without creating accounts or providing personal information.
File preview: View images and text files directly in the browser before downloading to verify content.
Upload limits: Configure maximum file sizes and storage quotas to control resource usage on your server.
Clean interface: Focus on file sharing with a minimal design that loads quickly and works on all devices.
Self-hosted privacy: Keep uploaded files on your own infrastructure without relying on third-party services.
